alert.note: Alert for Eastern Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 1:43PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected tonight into Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Mixed precipitation and a light glaze of ice expected Tuesday night. * WHERE...The Eastern Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
